system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Mace)} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Pick)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.GLkYAewdiuXqQDG8]{Heavy Melee Weapons Martial Arts}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.h5PGZMcVx0AdiYDK]{Heavy Melee Weapons Specialist}

Benefits

When wielding a light mace, flail, heavy mace, kama, light pick, or heavy pick, the Critical Threat range for the selected weapon is 12-18, and any natural roll of a 15-18 is an automatic hit. Also, the selected weapon ignores up to 3 points of Damage Reduction .

Normal

16-18 are automatic hits without this feat
system.summary: 12-18 crit, 15-18 autohit, ignore 3 DR on target.
